services.name: Dirt Delivery
services.description: Professional dirt delivery services for construction and lot development
services.shortDescription: Quality fill dirt delivered directly to your site
benefits: High-quality fill dirt sourced locally
Accurate drop-off at your specified location
Work within your timeline and budget
Start your project on solid ground without delays
Various dirt types available (fill dirt, topsoil, screened dirt)
process: Contact us for a free quote
Specify your dirt type and quantity needed
Receive quality dirt delivered to your site
Optional spreading and grading services available

faqs.question: What types of dirt do you deliver?
faqs.answer: We deliver fill dirt, topsoil, screened dirt, and clay. Each type serves different purposes for construction and landscaping projects.

faqs.question: How do I know how much dirt I need?
faqs.answer: Our team can help you calculate the amount needed based on your project dimensions. Generally, we measure in cubic yards.

faqs.question: Do you offer same-day delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer same-day delivery when available. Contact us early in the day for best availability.

services.name: Gravel Delivery
services.description: Reliable gravel delivery for driveways, construction sites, and landscaping projects
services.shortDescription: Various gravel types delivered for any project size
benefits: Multiple gravel types and sizes available
Prompt delivery to keep projects moving
Competitive pricing for all quantities
Professional operators and equipment
Excellent for drainage and stability
process: Choose your gravel type (crushed stone, pea gravel, river rock, etc.)
Request a free quote for your quantity
Receive gravel delivered precisely where needed

faqs.question: What gravel types do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer crushed stone, pea gravel, river rock, #57 stone, #8 stone, and more. Each type has different uses and aesthetics.

faqs.question: Can you deliver gravel for a residential driveway?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We serve residential, commercial, and construction clients with loads of all sizes.

faqs.question: How is gravel measured and priced?
faqs.answer: Gravel is typically sold by the ton or cubic yard. We'll help you determine the right amount for your project.

services.name: Sand Delivery
services.description: Sand delivery services for construction, landscaping, and recreational applications
services.shortDescription: Clean sand delivered for construction and landscaping
benefits: Clean, washed sand for various applications
Multiple sand types available
Reliable delivery scheduling
Suitable for construction and recreational use
Competitive rates for all project sizes
process: Determine your sand type and quantity
Contact us for pricing and availability
Sand delivered to your specified location

faqs.question: What types of sand do you deliver?
faqs.answer: We deliver mason sand, concrete sand, play sand, and fill sand. Each type is suited for different applications.

faqs.question: Is your play sand safe for children?
faqs.answer: Yes, our play sand is clean, washed, and safe for recreational use in sandboxes and play areas.

faqs.question: Can I order a small amount of sand?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accommodate orders of all sizes, from small residential needs to large commercial projects.

services.name: Salt Delivery
services.description: Bulk salt delivery for winter safety and ice management
services.shortDescription: Keep properties safe with bulk salt delivery
benefits: Bulk quantities available for entire season
Rock salt and treated salt options
Reliable pre-season and emergency delivery
Competitive pricing for volume orders
Keep properties safe all winter long
process: Request a quote for bulk delivery
Salt delivered and stored at your location

faqs.question: When should I order salt for winter?
faqs.answer: We recommend ordering in late fall before winter weather begins. Pre-season orders ensure availability and best pricing.

faqs.question: What's the difference between rock salt and treated salt?
faqs.answer: Rock salt is standard sodium chloride. Treated salt includes additives that help it work at lower temperatures and reduce concrete damage.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency salt delivery during storms?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide emergency delivery service during winter storms, subject to safe driving conditions and availability.

services.name: Site Preparation
services.description: Complete site preparation services for construction projects
services.shortDescription: Professional site prep from clearing to grading
benefits: Complete site services from start to finish
Experienced operators and modern equipment
Proper grading for drainage and stability
Saves time and coordinates all site work
Licensed and insured for your protection
process: Site ready for construction to begin

faqs.question: What does site preparation include?
faqs.answer: Site prep can include clearing vegetation, removing debris, excavation, grading, compaction, and ensuring proper drainage.

faqs.question: How long does site preparation take?
faqs.answer: Timeline depends on site size and complexity. Most residential sites take 1-3 days, while larger commercial sites may take 1-2 weeks.

faqs.question: Do you handle permits for site work?
faqs.answer: We can assist with permit requirements and work with local authorities. Permit responsibility typically lies with the property owner or contractor.

services.name: Material Spreading
services.description: Professional spreading services for dirt, gravel, and other materials
benefits: Professional results with proper equipment
Saves time and physical labor
Even distribution and proper grading
Experienced operators
Complements our delivery services
process: Site ready for next construction phase

faqs.question: Do you offer spreading with material delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer spreading services as an add-on to any material delivery. Just request it when ordering.

faqs.question: What equipment do you use for spreading?
faqs.answer: We use skid steers, bulldozers, and grading equipment appropriate for your project size and material type.

faqs.question: Can you grade for proper drainage?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our operators are experienced in grading for proper water drainage and site stability.

services.name: Debris Removal
services.description: Demolition debris and construction waste removal services
services.shortDescription: Fast debris removal and site cleanup
benefits: Keep job sites clean and safe
Proper disposal of all materials
Fast turnaround to keep projects moving
Handles concrete, wood, metal, and general debris
Licensed waste hauling
process: Load and haul debris from site
Clean, clear site ready for work

faqs.question: What types of debris do you remove?
faqs.answer: We remove construction debris, concrete, asphalt, wood, metal, dirt, and general waste from job sites.

faqs.question: Do you offer same-day debris removal?
faqs.answer: Same-day service is often available. Contact us early in the day for best availability.

faqs.question: How is debris removal priced?
faqs.answer: Pricing is based on debris volume, type, and disposal requirements. We provide free quotes before starting work.
